Description._LCLZText: Extend the functionality of Fusion with an integrated cloud product-management solution. Use the Manage extension to introduce formal release processes, maintain a complete history of data, and give stakeholders access to approved data.
Assigns unique item numbers to selected components for tracking throughout their life cycles.
Transitions the component to the next life cycle state or revision without a change order.
Releases the selected components with a Change Order (CO).
